title: Transpositions in the symmetric group
content:
Transpositions are special cases of "cycles" as defined in [Rotman] p. 28: "Let i1 , i2 , ... , ir be distinct integers between 1 and n. If α in Sn fixes the other integers and α(i1) = i2, α(i2) = i3, ..., α(ir-1 ) = ir, α(ir) = i1, then α is an r-cycle. We also say that α is a cycle of length r." and in [Rotman] p. 31: "A 2-cycle is also called transposition.".

We (currently) do not have/need a definition for cycles, so transpositions are explicitly defined in ~ df-pmtr .

blocks.origin: const class cpmtr { pmTrsp }

df-pmtr
blocks.content: Define a function that generates the transpositions on a set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pmtr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cpmtr, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s3, cv(s0), cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s1), csn(cv(s3)))), cv(s3), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-pmtr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ pmTrsp =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(s0)| s2[‚âÖ]2o } ‚Ü¶(s3 ‚àà s0 ‚Ü¶ if(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚ãÉ(s1 \ { s3 }), s3))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: f1omvdmvd
blocks.content: A permutation of any class moves a point which is moved to a different point which is moved. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1omvdmvd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cdif(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), csn(c2))))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cdif(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), csn(c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wne(cfv(c0, c2), c2))
  mpbird(wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wne(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c2)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  mpbird(wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))), wne(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c2)), cfv(c0, c2)), wne(cfv(c0, c2), c2))
  necon3bid(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c2)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, c2), c2, wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))))
  syl12anc(wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c2)), cfv(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c2)), wf1(c0, c1, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  adantr(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wf1(c0, c1, c1))
  f1of1(c0, c1, c1)
  f1fveq(c0, c1, c1, cfv(c0, c2), c2)
  syl2an2r(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wb(wcel(cfv(c0, c2), cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wne(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c2)), cfv(c0, c2))), wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c1))
  ffvelrnd(c0, c2, c1, c1, wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))))
  adantr(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wf(c0, c1, c1))
  f1of(c0, c1, c1)
  fnelnfp(c0, c1, cfv(c0, c2))
  mpbid(wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))), wne(cfv(c0, c2), c2), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))))
  simpr(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))))
  syl2an2r(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wb(wcel(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wne(cfv(c0, c2), c2)), wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  f1ofn(c0, c1, c1)
  sselda(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), c1, wf1o(c0, c1, c1))
  syl5sseq(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), c1, cdm(c0), wf1o(c0, c1, c1))
  ax-mp(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdm(c0)), wss(cdif(c0, cid), c0))
  difss(c0, cid)
  dmss(cdif(c0, cid), c0)
  f1odm(c0, c1, c1)
  fnelnfp(c0, c1, c2)
  eldifsn(cfv(c0, c2), cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), c2)
}

blocks.name: f1omvdcnv
blocks.content: A permutation and its inverse move the same points. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1omvdcnv(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wceq(cdm(cdif(ccnv(c0), cid)), cdm(cdif(c0, cid))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cdm(cdif(ccnv(c0), cid)), cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), crab(hs0, c1, wne(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), crab(hs0, c1, wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), wf1o(c0, c1, c1))
  rabbidva(hs0, c1, wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wne(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  necon3bid(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  bicomd(wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  3anidm23(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))))
  f1ocnvfvb(c0, c1, c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  3syl(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wceq(cdm(cdif(ccnv(c0), cid)), crab(hs0, c1, wne(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))), wf1o(ccnv(c0), c1, c1), wfn(ccnv(c0), c1))
  f1ocnv(c0, c1, c1)
  f1ofn(ccnv(c0), c1, c1)
  fndifnfp(hs0, ccnv(c0), c1)
  syl(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wceq(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), crab(hs0, c1, wne(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, c1))
  f1ofn(c0, c1, c1)
  fndifnfp(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wf1o(c0, c1, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: mvdco
blocks.content: Composing two permutations moves at most the union of the points. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mvdco(class c0, class c1) {

  eqtri(cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, c1), cid)), cun(cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), cid)), cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, cdif(c1, cid)), cid))), cdm(cun(cdif(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), cid), cdif(ccom(c0, cdif(c1, cid)), cid))))

  difeq1i(ccom(c0, c1), cid, cun(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), ccom(c0, cdif(c1, cid))))
  eqtr3i(ccom(c0, c1), cun(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), ccom(c0, cdif(c1, cid))), ccom(c0, cun(cin(c1, cid), cdif(c1, cid))))
  coeq2i(c0, cun(cin(c1, cid), cdif(c1, cid)), c1)
  inundif(c1, cid)

  mp2an(wss(cun(cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), cid)), cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, cdif(c1, cid)), cid))), cun(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdm(cdif(c1, cid)))), wss(cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), cid)), cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wss(cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, cdif(c1, cid)), cid)), cdm(cdif(c1, cid))))
  mp2b(wss(cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), cid)), cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wss(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), c0), wss(cdif(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), cid), cdif(c0, cid)))
  sstri(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), c0, ccom(c0, cid))
  ax-mp(wss(ccom(c0, cin(c1, cid)), ccom(c0, cid)), wss(cin(c1, cid), cid))
  inss2(c1, cid)
  coss2(cin(c1, cid), cid, c0)
  eqsstri(ccom(c0, cid), c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))
  eqtr3i(ccom(c0, cid), ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccom(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cid))

  relcnv(ccnv(c0))
  coi1(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))

blocks.content: If exactly one of two permutations is limited to a set of points, then the composition will not be. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: f1omvdco3
blocks.content: If a point is moved by exactly one of two permutations, then it will be moved by their composite. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm f1omvdco3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wf1o(c2, c1, c1), wxo(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid))))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, c2), cid))))
} = {
  syl3an3b(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wf1o(c2, c1, c1), wxo(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid)))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, c2), cid))), wxo(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wss(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3)))))
  3bitr4i(wxo(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid)))), wxo(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wss(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3)))), wn(wb(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid))))), wn(wb(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wss(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))))))
  notbii(wb(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid)))), wb(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wss(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3)))))
  bitri(wb(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid)))), wb(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wss(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3)))), wb(wn(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))), wn(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid))))))
  notbi(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid))))
  bibi12i(wn(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))), wn(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid)))), wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wss(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))))
  bitr3i(wn(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))), wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wceq(cin(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), csn(c3)), emptycls))
  disjsn(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), c3)
  disj2(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), csn(c3))
  bitr3i(wn(wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(c2, cid)))), wss(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wceq(cin(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), csn(c3)), emptycls))
  disjsn(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), c3)
  disj2(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), csn(c3))

  df-xor(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wss(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))))
  sylibr(w3a(wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wf1o(c2, c1, c1), wxo(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wss(cdm(cdif(c2, cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3))))), wcel(c3, cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, c2), cid))), wn(wss(cdm(cdif(ccom(c0, c2), cid)), cdif(universe, csn(c3)))))
  f1omvdco2(c0, c1, c2, cdif(universe, csn(c3)))

blocks.name: pmtrfval
blocks.content: The function generating transpositions on a set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtrfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cpmtr, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  syl5eq(c2, cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))), cfv(cpmtr, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cpmtr, c0), cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt3i(hs0, c0, universe, cpmtr, cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, cv(hs0), cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, cv(hs0), cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), crab(s1, cpw(c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s2, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s2)))), cv(s2), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabeqdv(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, c2o))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)

  df-pmtr(hs0, s0, s1, s2)

  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)‚Üí((c4 ` c2)` c3)= if(c3 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { c3 }), c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(pmTrsp ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c4 ` c2)` c3), if(c3 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { c3 }), c3), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), hs0))` c3), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o), c3 ‚àà c0, ((c4 ` c2)` c3)=((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), hs0))` c3))
  fveq1d((c4 ` c2), c3, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), hs0)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o))
  pmtrval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4)
  fvmptd3(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), hs0)), c3, if(c3 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { c3 }), c3), c0, if(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), hs0), universe, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), hs0)))
  ifbieq12d(‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), hs0, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { c3 }), c3, hs0 = c3, hs0 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  eleq1(hs0, c3, c2)
  unieqd((c2 \ { hs0 }), (c2 \ { c3 }), hs0 = c3)
  difeq2d(c2, { hs0 }, { c3 }, hs0 = c3)
  sneq(hs0, c3)
  id(hs0 = c3)
  simpr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o), c3 ‚àà c0)
  sylancom((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o), c3 ‚àà c0, if(c3 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { c3 }), c3)‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { c3 })‚àà ùïå)
  4syl(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { c3 })‚àà ùïå, c2[‚âÖ]2o, c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c2 \ { c3 })‚àà ùïå)
  simpl3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c0, c2[‚âÖ]2o, c3 ‚àà c0)
  brrelex1i(c2, cen, c2o)
  relen()
  difexg(c2, universe, { c3 })
  uniexg((c2 \ { c3 }), universe)
  ifexg(‚ãÉ(c2 \ { c3 }), universe, c3, c0, c3 ‚àà c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(if(c3 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { c3 }), c3))

blocks.name: pmtrprfv
blocks.content: In a transposition of two given points, each maps to the other. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Aug-2015.)

thm pmtrprfv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(c4, cpr(c2, c3)), c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpmtr, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(c4, cpr(c2, c3)), c2), c3, cif(cuni(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2))), c2, wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))))
  syl31anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(c4, cpr(c2, c3)), c2), cif(cuni(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2))), c2, wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c3)))), wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpr(c2, c3), c0), wbr(cpr(c2, c3), cen, c2o), wcel(c2, c0))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3)))
  prssd(c2, c3, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3)), wbr(cpr(c2, c3), cen, c2o))
  pr2nelem(c2, c0, c3, c0)
  pmtrfv(c0, c1, cpr(c2, c3), c2, c4)
  eqtrd(cif(cuni(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2))), c2, wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c3))), c3, cuni(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))))
  iftrued(cuni(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2))), c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c3)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, c0))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))
  prid1g(c2, c0, c3)
  eqtrd(cuni(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2))), c3, cuni(csn(c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))))
  unieqd(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2)), csn(c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))))
  eqssd(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2)), csn(c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wss(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2)), csn(c3)))
  difprsnss(c2, c3)
  snssd(c3, cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wcel(c3, cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c2))), wcel(c3, cpr(c2, c3)), wne(c3, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wcel(c3, cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(c3, c0))
  prid2g(c3, c0, c2)
  necomd(c3, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))
  eldifsn(c3, cpr(c2, c3), c2)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wceq(cuni(csn(c3)), c3), wcel(c3, c0))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))
  unisng(c3, c0)
}

thm pmtrprfv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3))‚Üí((c4 ` { c2, c3 })` c2)= c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(pmTrsp ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c4 ` { c2, c3 })` c2), c3, if(c2 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, ‚ãÉ({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)))
  syl31anc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)), ((c4 ` { c2, c3 })` c2)= if(c2 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, ‚ãÉ({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), c2), c0 ‚àà c1, { c2, c3 } ‚äÜ c0, { c2, c3 }[‚âÖ]2o, c2 ‚àà c0)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3))
  prssd(c2, c3, c0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3), { c2, c3 }[‚âÖ]2o)
  pr2nelem(c2, c0, c3, c0)
  pmtrfv(c0, c1, { c2, c3 }, c2, c4)
  eqtrd(if(c2 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, ‚ãÉ({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), c2), c3, ‚ãÉ({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)))
  iftrued(‚ãÉ({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), c2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)), c2 ‚àà { c2, c3 })
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)), c2 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, c2 ‚àà c0)
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚â† c3)
  prid1g(c2, c0, c3)
  eqtrd(‚ãÉ({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), c3, ‚ãÉ { c3 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)))
  unieqd(({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), { c3 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)))
  eqssd(({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), { c3 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)), ({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 })‚äÜ { c3 })
  difprsnss(c2, c3)
  snssd(c3, ({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)))
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)), c3 ‚àà({ c2, c3 } \ { c2 }), c3 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, c3 ‚â† c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)), c3 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, c3 ‚àà c0)
  prid2g(c3, c0, c2)
  necomd(c3, c2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)))
  simpr3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚â† c3)
  eldifsn(c3, { c2, c3 }, c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c3)), ‚ãÉ { c3 } = c3, c3 ‚àà c0)
  simpr2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚â† c3)
  unisng(c3, c0)
}

blocks.name: pmtrprfv3
blocks.content: In a transposition of two given points, all other points are mapped to themselves. (Contributed by AV, 17-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtrprfv3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4))), wceq(cfv(cfv(c5, cpr(c2, c3)), c4), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpmtr, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(c5, cpr(c2, c3)), c4), c4, cif(cuni(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c4))), c4, wcel(c4, cpr(c2, c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4))))
  syl31anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4))), wceq(cfv(cfv(c5, cpr(c2, c3)), c4), cif(cuni(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c4))), c4, wcel(c4, cpr(c2, c3)))), wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpr(c2, c3), c0), wbr(cpr(c2, c3), cen, c2o), wcel(c4, c0))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)))
  prssd(c2, c3, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4))))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), wcel(c2, c0))
  simp1(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0))
  simp22(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), wbr(cpr(c2, c3), cen, c2o))
  impcom(w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), wbr(cpr(c2, c3), cen, c2o))
  3ad2ant1(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4), wi(w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), wbr(cpr(c2, c3), cen, c2o)))
  com12(wne(c2, c3), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), wbr(cpr(c2, c3), cen, c2o))
  3adant3(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0), wi(wne(c2, c3), wbr(cpr(c2, c3), cen, c2o)))
  3expia(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3), wbr(cpr(c2, c3), cen, c2o))
  pr2nelem(c2, c0, c3, c0)
  simp23(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)))
  pmtrfv(c0, c1, cpr(c2, c3), c4, c5)
  iffalsed(cuni(cdif(cpr(c2, c3), csn(c4))), c4, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4))), wcel(c4, cpr(c2, c3)))
  nelprd(c4, c2, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), wne(c4, c2))
  3ad2ant2(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4), wne(c4, c2))
  biimpi(wne(c2, c4), wne(c4, c2))
  necom(c2, c4)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c4, c0)), w3a(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), wne(c4, c3))
  3ad2ant3(wne(c2, c3), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4), wne(c4, c3))
  biimpi(wne(c3, c4), wne(c4, c3))
  necom(c3, c4)
}

thm pmtrprfv3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0)‚àß(c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4))‚Üí((c5 ` { c2, c3 })` c4)= c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(pmTrsp ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c5 ` { c2, c3 })` c4), c4, if(c4 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, ‚ãÉ({ c2, c3 } \ { c4 }), c4), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0)‚àß(c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4)))
  syl31anc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0)‚àß(c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4)), ((c5 ` { c2, c3 })` c4)= if(c4 ‚àà { c2, c3 }, ‚ãÉ({ c2, c3 } \ { c4 }), c4), c0 ‚àà c1, { c2, c3 } ‚äÜ c0, { c2, c3 }[‚âÖ]2o, c4 ‚àà c0)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0), (c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4))
  prssd(c2, c3, c0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0)‚àß(c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4)))
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0), (c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4), c2 ‚àà c0)
  simp1(c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, c4 ‚àà c0)
  simp22(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, c4 ‚àà c0, (c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0), (c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4), { c2, c3 }[‚âÖ]2o)
  impcom((c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0), (c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4), { c2, c3 }[‚âÖ]2o)
  3ad2ant1(c2 ‚â† c3, c2 ‚â† c4, c3 ‚â† c4, ((c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0)‚Üí { c2, c3 }[‚âÖ]2o))
  com12(c2 ‚â† c3, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0), { c2, c3 }[‚âÖ]2o)

  3ad2ant2(c2 ‚â† c3, c2 ‚â† c4, c3 ‚â† c4, c4 ‚â† c2)
  biimpi(c2 ‚â† c4, c4 ‚â† c2)
  necom(c2, c4)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c0), (c2 ‚â† c3 ‚àß c2 ‚â† c4 ‚àß c3 ‚â† c4), c4 ‚â† c3)
  3ad2ant3(c2 ‚â† c3, c2 ‚â† c4, c3 ‚â† c4, c4 ‚â† c3)

blocks.name: pmtrf
blocks.content: Functionality of a transposition. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtrf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wf(cfv(c3, c2), c0, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpmtr, c0))
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, cfv(c3, c2), c0, c0, cif(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)))
  pmtrval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ifclda(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), c0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sseldd(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), c0, c2, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simpll2(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  3syl(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), c2), wbr(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c1o), wcel(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  mp3an2i(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c1o), wcel(c1o, com), wbr(c2, cen, csuc(c1o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  1onn()
  syl6breq(c2, cen, csuc(c1o), c2o, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simpll3(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  df-2o()
  simpr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  dif1en(c1o, c2, cv(hs0))
  en1uniel(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))
  eldifi(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), c2, csn(cv(hs0)))
  simplr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm pmtrf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚Üí((c3 ` c2): c0 ‚Üí c0))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(pmTrsp ` c0)
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, (c3 ` c2), c0, c0, if(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), hs0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o))
  pmtrval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ifclda(‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), hs0, c0, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  sseldd(‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), c0, c2, (((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  simpll2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c0, c2[‚âÖ]2o, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  3syl((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 })‚àà c2, (c2 \ { hs0 })[‚âÖ]1o, ‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 })‚àà(c2 \ { hs0 }))
  mp3an2i((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c2 \ { hs0 })[‚âÖ]1o, 1o ‚àà _om, c2[‚âÖ]suc(1o), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  1onn()
  syl6breq(c2, cen, suc(1o), c2o, (((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  simpll3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c0, c2[‚âÖ]2o, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  df-2o()
  simpr(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà c2)
  dif1en(c1o, c2, hs0)
  en1uniel((c2 \ { hs0 }))
  eldifi(‚ãÉ(c2 \ { hs0 }), c2, { hs0 })
  simplr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o), hs0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c2[‚âÖ]2o))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: pmtrmvd
blocks.content: A transposition moves precisely the transposed points. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtrmvd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wceq(cdm(cdif(cfv(c3, c2), cid)), c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpmtr, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cdm(cdif(cfv(c3, c2), cid)), c2, crab(hs0, c0, wne(cfv(cfv(c3, c2), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), cin(c2, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)))
  3syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wceq(cdm(cdif(cfv(c3, c2), cid)), crab(hs0, c0, wne(cfv(cfv(c3, c2), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))), wf(cfv(c3, c2), c0, c0), wfn(cfv(c3, c2), c0))
  pmtrf(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ffn(cfv(c3, c2), c0, c0)
  fndifnfp(hs0, cfv(c3, c2), c0)
  syl6eqr(crab(hs0, c0, wne(cfv(cfv(c3, c2), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), cin(c2, c0), crab(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)))
  rabbidva(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wne(cfv(cfv(c3, c2), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  bitrd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(cfv(cfv(c3, c2), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wne(cif(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), cv(hs0)))
  neeq1d(cfv(cfv(c3, c2), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), cif(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  pmtrfv(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c3)
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wne(cif(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  impbid2(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wne(cif(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  necon1ai(cif(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  iffalse(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wne(cif(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), cv(hs0)))
  eqnetrd(cif(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), cv(hs0), cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cif(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  iftrue(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  3syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wne(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0)), wbr(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c1o), wcel(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  mp3an2i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c1o), wcel(c1o, com), wbr(c2, cen, csuc(c1o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  1onn()
  syl6breq(c2, cen, csuc(c1o), c2o, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  df-2o()
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  dif1en(c1o, c2, cv(hs0))
  en1uniel(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))
  eldifsni(cuni(cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), c2, cv(hs0))
  eqtri(cin(c2, c0), crab(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), cin(c0, c2))
  incom(c2, c0)
  dfin5(hs0, c0, c2)
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)), wceq(cin(c2, c0), c2), wss(c2, c0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o))
  df-ss(c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(c2, cen, c2o)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: pmtrffv
blocks.content: Mapping of a point under a transposition function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtrffv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cif(cuni(cdif(c4, csn(c2))), c2, wcel(c2, c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpmtr, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c2), cif(cuni(cdif(c4, csn(c2))), c2, wcel(c2, c4)), cfv(cfv(c5, c4), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(cfv(c5, c4), c2)))
  fveq1d(c0, c2, cfv(c5, c4), wcel(c0, c1))
  simprd(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c4)), w3a(wcel(c3, universe), wss(c4, c3), wbr(c4, cen, c2o)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(cfv(c5, c4), c2), cif(cuni(cdif(c4, csn(c2))), c2, wcel(c2, c4))), w3a(wcel(c3, universe), wss(c4, c3), wbr(c4, cen, c2o)))
  simpld(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c3, universe), wss(c4, c3), wbr(c4, cen, c2o)), wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c4)))
  pmtrfrn(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  pmtrfv(c3, universe, c4, c2, c5)
}

} = {
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, c1), wne(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), emptycls), wne(c2o, emptycls))
  2on0()
  necon3bid(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), emptycls, c2o, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1))
  3bitr3g(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), emptycls), wceq(c2o, emptycls), wbr(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cen, emptycls), wbr(c2o, cen, emptycls))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cen, emptycls), wbr(c2o, cen, emptycls)), wbr(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cen, c2o))
  simp3d(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cen, c2o), wcel(c3, universe), wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), c3))
  simpld(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c3, universe), wss(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), c3), wbr(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), cen, c2o)), wceq(c0, cfv(c2, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))))
  pmtrfrn(c0, c1, c3, cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), c2)
  eqid(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))
  enen1(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)), c2o, emptycls)
  en0(cdm(cdif(c0, cid)))
  en0(c2o)
}

blocks.content: The symmetric group has subgroups restricting the set of non-fixed points. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Aug-2015.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  issubgrpd2(hs0, hs1, crab(s0, c2, wss(cdm(cdif(cv(s0), cid)), c3)), c4, co(c4, cress, crab(s0, c2, wss(cdm(cdif(cv(s0), cid)), c3))), cfv(c0g, c4), cfv(cplusg, c4), wcel(c0, c1))

  ssrab2(s0, c2, wss(cdm(cdif(cv(s0), cid)), c3))
  elrabd(s0, cfv(c0g, c4), c2, wcel(c0, c1), wss(cdm(cdif(cv(s0), cid)), c3), wss(cdm(cdif(cfv(c0g, c4), cid)), c3))
  sseq1d(cdm(cdif(cv(s0), cid)), c3, cdm(cdif(cfv(c0g, c4), cid)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c4)))
  dmeqd(cdif(cv(s0), cid), cdif(cfv(c0g, c4), cid), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c4)))
  difeq1(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c4), cid)
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0g, c4), c2), wcel(c4, cgrp))

  eqid(cfv(c0g, c4))

  difeq1d(cres(cid, c0), cid, cfv(c0g, c4), wcel(c0, c1))
  symgid(c0, c1, c4)
  eqsstri(cdm(cdif(cres(cid, c0), cid)), c3, emptycls)
  eqtri(cdm(cdif(cres(cid, c0), cid)), emptycls, cdm(emptycls))
  dmeqi(cdif(cres(cid, c0), cid), emptycls)
  mpbi(wceq(cdif(cres(cid, c0), cid), emptycls), wss(cres(cid, c0), cid))
  resss(cid, c0)
  ssdif0(cres(cid, c0), cid)

thm symgfisg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí { s0 ‚àà c2 | dom((s0 \ =))‚àà Fin } ‚àà(SubGrp ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(SymGrp ` c0)

blocks.name: symgtrf
blocks.content: Transpositions are elements of the symmetric group. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm symgtrf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wss(c0, c1)
  -| wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csymg, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, c0, c1)
  mpbird(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c2))
  pmtrff1o(cv(hs0), c0, c2, cfv(cpmtr, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cpmtr, c2))
  elsymgbas2(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm symgtrf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚äÜ c1
  ‚ä£ c0 = ran((pmTrsp ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(SymGrp ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c3)
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, c0, c1)
  mpbird(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 : c2 ‚Üî c2))
  pmtrff1o(hs0, c0, c2, (pmTrsp ` c2))
  eqid((pmTrsp ` c2))
  elsymgbas2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: symggen2
blocks.content: A finite permutation group is generated by the transpositions, see also Theorem 3.4 in [Rotman] p. 31. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm symggen2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csymg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubmnd, c4)))
} = {
  eqtr4d(cfv(c1, c2), c3, crab(hs0, c3, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn)), wcel(c0, cfn))
  symggen(hs0, c0, cfn, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(c3, crab(hs0, c3, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn))), wral(hs0, c3, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c3, wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn), wss(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), c0))
  syl5sseq(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), c0, cdm(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  ax-mp(wss(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cdm(cv(hs0))), wss(cdif(cv(hs0), cid), cv(hs0)))
  difss(cv(hs0), cid)
  dmss(cdif(cv(hs0), cid), cv(hs0))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cdm(cv(hs0)), c0), wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c0))
  symgbasf1o(cv(hs0), c3, c0, c4)
  f1odm(cv(hs0), c0, c0)
  ssfi(c0, cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)))
  rabid2(hs0, c3, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfn))
}

thm symggen2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Fin ‚Üí(c1 ` c2)= c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ran((pmTrsp ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(SymGrp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(mrCls `(SubMnd ` c4))
} = {
  eqtr4d((c1 ` c2), c3, { hs0 ‚àà c3 | dom((hs0 \ =))‚àà Fin }, c0 ‚àà Fin)
  symggen(hs0, c0, cfn, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  sylibr(c0 ‚àà Fin, c3 = { hs0 ‚àà c3 | dom((hs0 \ =))‚àà Fin }, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c3, dom((hs0 \ =))‚àà Fin))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c3, c0 ‚àà Fin, dom((hs0 \ =))‚àà Fin)
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà Fin, hs0 ‚àà c3, dom((hs0 \ =))‚àà Fin, dom((hs0 \ =))‚äÜ c0)
  syl5sseq(dom((hs0 \ =)), c0, dom(hs0), hs0 ‚àà c3)
  ax-mp(dom((hs0 \ =))‚äÜ dom(hs0), (hs0 \ =)‚äÜ hs0)
  difss(hs0, cid)
  dmss((hs0 \ =), hs0)
  syl(hs0 ‚àà c3, dom(hs0)= c0, (hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c0))
  symgbasf1o(hs0, c3, c0, c4)
  f1odm(hs0, c0, c0)
  ssfi(c0, dom((hs0 \ =)))
  rabid2(hs0, c3, dom((hs0 \ =))‚àà Fin)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfn)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà Fin)
}

  fss(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c2)), c3, cfv(cbs, c5))

blocks.name: pmtr3ncom
blocks.content: Transpositions over sets with at least 3 elements are not commutative, see also the remark in [Rotman] p. 28. (Contributed by AV, 21-Mar-2019.)

thm pmtrdifwrdel2lem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0)),((c4 ` s0)` c2)= c2))
  ‚ä£ c1 = ran((pmTrsp `(c3 \ { c2 })))
  ‚ä£ c5 = ran((pmTrsp ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s1 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0))‚Ü¶((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s1)\ =))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0)),((c4 ` s0)` c2)= c2)), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0)),((c4 ` s0)` c2)= c2)), d(s1, c5))
  ralrimiva(s0, (0[..^](# ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ((c4 ` s0)` c2)= c2)
  eqtrd(((c4 ` s0)` c2), c2, (((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =)))` c2), ((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0))))
  fveq1d((c4 ` s0), c2, ((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =))), ((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0))))
  sylancl(((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0))), (c4 ` s0)=((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =))), s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0)), ((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =)))‚àà ùïå)
  simpr((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0)))
  fvex((pmTrsp ` c3), dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =)))
  fvmptg(s1, s0, (0[..^](# ` c0)), ((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =))), universe, c4, ((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s1)\ =))))
  fveq2d((pmTrsp ` c3), dom(((c0 ` s1)\ =)), dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =)), s1 = s0)
  dmeqd(((c0 ` s1)\ =), ((c0 ` s0)\ =), s1 = s0)
  difeq1d((c0 ` s1), cid, (c0 ` s0), s1 = s0)
  fveq2(s1, s0, c0)
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0))), (((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =)))` c2)= c2, (c0 ` s0)‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)
  adantlr(c0 ‚àà Word(c1), c2 ‚àà c3, s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0)), (c0 ` s0)‚àà c1)
  wrdsymbcl(c0, c1, s0)
  simplr(c0 ‚àà Word(c1), c2 ‚àà c3, s0 ‚àà(0[..^](# ` c0)))
  pmtrdifellem4((c0 ` s0), c1, c2, c3, ((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =))), c5)
  eqid(((pmTrsp ` c3)` dom(((c0 ` s0)\ =))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà Word(c1), c2 ‚àà c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, Word(c1))
  diff.cword.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfzo, (# ` c0))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfzo.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chash, c0)

  diff.cid.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: pmtrdifwrdel
blocks.content: A sequence of transpositions of elements of a set without a special element corresponds to a sequence of transpositions of elements of the set. (Contributed by AV, 15-Jan-2019.)

blocks.name: pmtrdifwrdel2
blocks.content: A sequence of transpositions of elements of a set without a special element corresponds to a sequence of transpositions of elements of the set not moving the special element. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2019.)

  elsni(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2))
  eqtrd(cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cif(nat2, nat1, wceq(cv(s1), nat1)), cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2)), wcel(cv(s1), cpr(nat1, nat2))))

  syl6eq(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))), csn(nat2), cdif(cpr(nat1, nat2), csn(nat1)), wa(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2))))
  difeq12d(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)), cpr(nat1, nat2), csn(nat1), wa(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2))))
  simpr(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2)), wceq(csn(cv(s1)), csn(nat1)))

  ax-mp(wceq(cdif(cpr(nat1, nat2), csn(nat1)), csn(nat2)), wne(nat1, nat2))
  difprsn1(nat1, nat2)
  adantr(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2)), wceq(cif(nat2, nat1, wceq(cv(s1), nat1)), nat2))
  iftrue(nat2, nat1, wceq(cv(s1), nat1))

  3eqtr4a(cuni(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), cif(nat2, nat1, wceq(cv(s1), nat1)), cuni(csn(nat1)), nat1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), nat2), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2))))
  unisn(nat1)

  syl6eq(cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))), csn(nat1), cdif(cpr(nat1, nat2), csn(nat2)), wa(wceq(cv(s1), nat2), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2))))
  difeq12d(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)), cpr(nat1, nat2), csn(nat2), wa(wceq(cv(s1), nat2), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2))))
  simpr(wceq(cv(s1), nat2), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(nat1, nat2)))

thm pmtrprfval(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ‚ä¢ (pmTrsp ` { 1, 2 })=(s0 ‚àà { { 1, 2 } } ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = 1, 2, 1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqtri((pmTrsp ` { 1, 2 }), (s0 ‚àà { { 1, 2 } } ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = 1, 2, 1))), (s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà P({ 1, 2 })| hs0[‚âÖ]2o } ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1))))
  ax-mp((pmTrsp ` { 1, 2 })=(s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà P({ 1, 2 })| hs0[‚âÖ]2o } ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1))), { 1, 2 } ‚àà ùïå)
  prex(nat1, nat2)
  pmtrfval(s0, hs0, s1, { 1, 2 }, universe, (pmTrsp ` { 1, 2 }))
  eqid((pmTrsp ` { 1, 2 }))
  eqtri((s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà P({ 1, 2 })| hs0[‚âÖ]2o } ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1))), (s0 ‚àà { { 1, 2 } } ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = 1, 2, 1))), (s0 ‚àà { { 1, 2 } } ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1))))
  mpteq1i(s0, { hs0 ‚àà P({ 1, 2 })| hs0[‚âÖ]2o }, (s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1)), { { 1, 2 } })
  mp3an({ hs0 ‚àà P({ 1, 2 })| hs0[‚âÖ]2o } = { { 1, 2 } }, 1 ‚àà ùïå, 2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, 1 ‚â† 2)
  2nn0()
  pr2pwpr(hs0, nat1, universe, nat2, cn0)
  mpteq2ia(s0, { { 1, 2 } }, (s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1)), (s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 } ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = 1, 2, 1)))
  mpteq2dva(s1, { 1, 2 }, if(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1), if(s1 = 1, 2, 1), s0 ‚àà { { 1, 2 } })
  sylan(s0 ‚àà { { 1, 2 } }, s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 }, if(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1)= if(s1 = 1, 2, 1), s0 = { 1, 2 })
  elsni(s0, { 1, 2 })
  eqtrd(if(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1), if(s1 = 1, 2, 1), ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), (s0 = { 1, 2 } ‚àß s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 }))
  iftrued(‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), s1, (s0 = { 1, 2 } ‚àß s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 }), s1 ‚àà s0)
  biimpar(s0 = { 1, 2 }, s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 }, s1 ‚àà s0)
  eleq2(s0, { 1, 2 }, s1)
  impcom(s0 = { 1, 2 }, s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 }, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 })= if(s1 = 1, 2, 1))
  syl(s1 ‚àà { 1, 2 }, (s0 = { 1, 2 } ‚Üí ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 })= if(s1 = 1, 2, 1)), (s1 = 1 ‚à® s1 = 2))
  elpri(s1, nat1, nat2)
  jaoi(s1 = 1, s1 = 2, (s0 = { 1, 2 } ‚Üí ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 })= if(s1 = 1, 2, 1)))
  ex(s1 = 1, s0 = { 1, 2 }, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 })= if(s1 = 1, 2, 1))
  3eqtr4a(‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), if(s1 = 1, 2, 1), ‚ãÉ { 2 }, nat2, (s1 = 1 ‚àß s0 = { 1, 2 }))
  unisn(nat2)
  2ex()
  unieqd((s0 \ { s1 }), { 2 }, (s1 = 1 ‚àß s0 = { 1, 2 }))
  syl6eq((s0 \ { s1 }), { 2 }, ({ 1, 2 } \ { 1 }), (s1 = 1 ‚àß s0 = { 1, 2 }))

  difprsn1(nat1, nat2)

  iftrue(nat2, nat1, s1 = 1)
  ex(s1 = 2, s0 = { 1, 2 }, ‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 })= if(s1 = 1, 2, 1))
  3eqtr4a(‚ãÉ(s0 \ { s1 }), if(s1 = 1, 2, 1), ‚ãÉ { 1 }, nat1, (s1 = 2 ‚àß s0 = { 1, 2 }))
  unisn(nat1)
  1ex()
  unieqd((s0 \ { s1 }), { 1 }, (s1 = 2 ‚àß s0 = { 1, 2 }))
  syl6eq((s0 \ { s1 }), { 1 }, ({ 1, 2 } \ { 2 }), (s1 = 2 ‚àß s0 = { 1, 2 }))
  difeq12d(s0, { s1 }, { 1, 2 }, { 2 }, (s1 = 2 ‚àß s0 = { 1, 2 }))
  simpr(s1 = 2, s0 = { 1, 2 })
  adantr(s1 = 2, s0 = { 1, 2 }, { s1 } = { 2 })
  sneq(s1, nat2)
  ax-mp(({ 1, 2 } \ { 2 })= { 1 }, 1 ‚â† 2)
  difprsn2(nat1, nat2)
  adantr(s1 = 2, s0 = { 1, 2 }, if(s1 = 1, 2, 1)= 1)
  iffalsed(nat2, nat1, s1 = 2, s1 = 1)
  mtbiri(s1 = 2, s1 = 1, 2 = 1)
  nesymi(nat2, nat1)
  1ne2()

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpmtr, { 1, 2 })
  diff.cpmtr.s(s0)

  diff.cfv.s(s1, cpmtr, { 1, 2 })

  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, P({ 1, 2 }), hs0[‚âÖ]2o)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, { 1, 2 })
  diff.wbr.s(s0, hs0, cen, c2o)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: pmtrprfvalrn
blocks.content: The range of the transpositions on a pair is actually a singleton: the transposition of the two elements of the pair. (Contributed by AV, 9-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtrprfvalrn() {
  |- wceq(crn(cfv(cpmtr, cpr(nat1, nat2))), csn(cpr(cop(nat1, nat2), cop(nat2, nat1))))
